long_description: The girls' REI Ski Stripes socks offer your youngster warmth and cushioning for happy times in the snow. Blend of merino wool, acrylic and polyester provides optimum insulation and moisture management to keep kids' feet warm and dry. A touch of spandex holds socks in place and offers formfitting comfort. Medium-weight cushioning in the sole enhances comfort. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The girls' REI Ski Stripes socks offer your youngster warmth and cushioning for happy times in the snow.
